edu.ualberta.controller
Class MultimediaControllerManager

java.lang.Object
  edu.ualberta.controller.MultimediaControllerManager

public class MultimediaControllerManager
extends java.lang.Object

MultimediaControllerManager merges all 3 controller into one to abstract developer from choosing which.

Note that this can only be initialize via Factory method to ensure one instance is only running.

Author:
Joey
